mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_LOG(LOG_NUM, USER_NUM, LOG_DATE) VALUES(SEQ_LOG.NEXTVAL, #{userNum}, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'))
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_LOG WHERE TO_CHAR(LOG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{day}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_LOG WHERE TO_CHAR(LOG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM') = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{month},'YYYY-MM'), 'YYYY-MM')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_LOG WHERE TO_CHAR(LOG_DATE, 'YYYY') = TO_CHAR(TO_DATE(#{year},'YYYY'), 'YYYY')
